definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: The winery, however, is the other side of the mountain near Beirut.
sentences.chinese: 然而，釀酒廠卻位於靠近貝魯特的山的另一邊。

sentences.english: Beirut is like the capital of Lebanon.
sentences.chinese: 貝魯特是黎巴嫩的首都。

sentences.english: Israeli forces are pounding Beirut for the first time in nearly two days.
sentences.chinese: 以色列軍隊近兩天以來首次轟炸貝魯特。

sentences.english: Nadim Houry is the director of Human Rights Watch's Beirut office.
sentences.chinese: 納迪姆Houry是人權觀察的貝魯特辦公室主任。

sentences.english: Children like Omar wander the streets of Beirut all day long.
sentences.chinese: 象奧馬爾這樣的孩子整天遊蕩在貝魯特的街上。

sentences.english: Last Two Beiruit Hostages 'To Go Free'. (The Last Two Hostages In Beiruit Are 'To Go Free'. )
sentences.chinese: 貝魯特最後兩名人質“獲釋在看”。

sentences.english: Tourists relax in a nargile (hookah, shisha) den in Beirut.
sentences.chinese: 貝魯特，在阿拉伯水煙房裏休息的遊客。

sentences.english: Born in southern Bake Lin, born in the Cayman family.
sentences.chinese: 生於貝魯特南部的巴克林，出身於曼家族。

sentences.english: Strolling along the Corniche in Beirut.
sentences.chinese: 貝魯特，沿着險路散步的人們。

sentences.english: It briefly brought anti-Syrian politicians to power in Beirut.
sentences.chinese: 簡單地把反敘利亞政治人物權力在貝魯特。

sentences.english: There is also a small Israelite population, traditionally centered in Beirut.
sentences.chinese: 還有一小部分猶太人，傳統上聚集在貝魯特。

sentences.english: The killing has set off anti-Syrian demonstrations in Beirut.
sentences.chinese: 哈里里被暗殺在貝魯特引發了反敘利亞的示威行動。

pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2

definition: Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]
